channel.title: Upcoming FreeBSD Events
channel.description: RSS feed of upcoming FreeBSD-related conferences, summits, courses, and other relevant events.

item.title: MeetBSD 2018
item.description: MeetBSD 2018 (https://www.meetbsd.com/), Intel Campus, Santa Clara, CA, United States 19 - 20 October, 2018. MeetBSD 2018 is a mixed unConference format event featuring both scheduled talks and community-driven events such as birds-of-a-feather meetings and speed geeking sessions.
